docs.snippet: Hate speech from the campaign is poisoning schools and communities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hate speech from the campaign is poisoning schools and communities.
docs.abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column warns Donald Trump's coarse rhetoric on campaign trail is rending social fabric of country; expresses concern that long after campaign is over, Americans will continue to be forced to deal with hate-filled, and poorly informed, beast Trump has unleashed.

headline.main: Donald Trump Is Making America Meaner

docs.snippet: Donald Trump's campaign on Sunday went on a new tear against the media, blaming the "disgusting" press for a week of distractions at a time when Republicans have urged him — again — to focus on Democratic rival Hillary Clinton....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump's campaign on Sunday went on a new tear against the media, blaming the "disgusting" press for a week of distractions at a time when Republicans have urged him — again — to focus on Democratic rival Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Trump Goes on Tear Against Media, Not Clinton
headline.print_headline: Trump Goes on Tear Against Media, Not Clinton

docs.snippet: A senior official with the Republican National Committee on Sunday played down the prospect that the party would cut off cash and logistical support to White House nominee Donald Trump in order to shift resources toward congressional races....
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior official with the Republican National Committee on Sunday played down the prospect that the party would cut off cash and logistical support to White House nominee Donald Trump in order to shift resources toward congressional races.

headline.main: Talk of Shifting Funds Away From Trump Premature: Republican Official
headline.print_headline: Talk of Shifting Funds Away From Trump Premature: Republican Official

docs.snippet: We all need paper ballots, and votes we can verify....
docs.lead_paragraph: We all need paper ballots, and votes we can verify.
docs.abstract: Campaign Stops column by Zeynep Tufekci underscores vulnerability of voting machines without verifiable paper trails to tampering; points out ways 2016 election can be protected from fraud and calls for use of voting systems leaving behind paper trail that is verifiable after election.

headline.main: The Election Won’t Be Rigged. But It Could Be Hacked.

docs.snippet: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump made an unusual foray Saturday night into deep-blue Connecticut, pledging to make "a big play" for the Democratic stronghold....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump made an unusual foray Saturday night into deep-blue Connecticut, pledging to make "a big play" for the Democratic stronghold.

headline.main: In Connecticut, Trump Promises a Major Push in a Blue State
headline.print_headline: In Connecticut, Trump Promises a Major Push in a Blue State

headline.main: Disillusionment, U.S.A. Where Voters Are Just Hoping for Change.
